idea:
Buzzo.ai enables AI powered Conversational Commerce across multiple channels: Website, Mobile app, Whatsapp, FB Messenger, Alexa and Google Assistant. Our Conversational AI Assistant functions like an unbiased expert with in-depth knowledge of all products and user reviews, with whom a shopper can simply interact for a few minutes to decide what to buy.


The founders of Buzzo.ai are IIT Alumni and serial entrepreneurs whose previous venture, MakeSense Technologies, was in the NLP / semantic search space and was acquired by India’s largest job portal.
name: XCOGNITION TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:

We pride ourselves on the quality of our advertiser and publisher partnerships that thrive due to our obsessive support and industry-leading technology.
Our lead generation services are built on a foundation of solid, reliable relationships between all concerned parties. That’s what makes Alif Media and Technologies Pvt Ltd the go-to performance marketing network for talented publishers and some of the biggest, most popular global brands. I would like to discuss some business opportunities that we can explore together.
name: Alif Media And Technologies Pvt Ltd

idea:
In a fast growing Digital World, Knowing Your Customer is more important than ever. Accura Scan provides Digital User On-Boarding smart and easy. Its AI and Deep Machine Learning verity’s Passports & ID Cards issued by over 200 countries helping companies to Identify and Authenticate their customers.

User On-Boarding and Authentication was always a big Manual Process for each industry specially Finance where more risk is involved. We replaced that using OCR ID Scan with Face Match and Liveness Detection. 

1. Easy API integration and SDK.
2. All process on clients server, No data comes to our server.
3. Pricing where any size of unit can afford this.
4. Authenticating Humans and not Devices
name: Accura Technolabs Private Limited

idea:
Janyutech is an OEM into robots for non-conducive/hazardous environments with complete in-house design, development & manufacturing capabilities. Our core Promoters are from IIT Mumbai.

Within a span of 30 months from inception, the company with its in-house research, completed the design of mechanical, electrical, software and intelligence elements of the all systems, iterations and started commercial delivery.
After our success in the defence sector with our "Man-portable, mine detection and defusing Robots", we have extended our product line into industry.
We are now offering robotic solutions to following applications:
• KARA - Industrial Robotic Arms for Pick & Place, Buffing, Welding, Machine tending and other critical operations
• Varaha- SC: All contour robots for Storage Tank inspection & Maintenance, Sludge Cleaning robots, Surface painting (external) , Interior cleaning & Painting robots for storage tanks and Silos.
• CLN-AXIS: Robots for Solar Panel Array Maintenance.
name: Janyu Technologies Pvt Ltd
